About

Mike's 2Cents is the love child of a drunken afternoon while romanticising life. It is what it is!

Words From The Author:

This wasn't supposed to be a blog. It shouldn't even exist. Basically, i was trying to understand 11ty, thus thought reacting a blog was the way to go. Funny enough, with each step of the building process, i combined my love for coding with my love for writing, and voila, i guess i have a blog now. Funny how life turns out, no?
